name: Note Summarizer
description: A specialized assistant for summarizing notes, extracting key points, and listing action items.

skills.name: Summarize Text
skills.description: Summarize raw notes into a concise, clear summary. Can adapt to requested styles like bullets, paragraph, or executive summary.
examples: Summarize these meeting notes into bullet points
Create an executive summary from this long note
Turn this messy scratchpad into a clean summary

skills.name: Extract Action Items
skills.description: Extract clear, actionable tasks and next steps from notes or meeting transcripts.
examples: List all action items from these meeting notes
What are the next steps and owners from this discussion?
Turn this transcript into a checklist of tasks
